com.taidoc.pclinklibrary.android.bluetooth.util

Class BluetoothUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.taidoc.pclinklibrary.android.bluetooth.util.BluetoothUtil

  • public class BluetoothUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    An Android Bluetooth Utility to control the Bluetooth module of android device and pair with other remote device.

    Since:
    Android 2.1
    Author:
    Cloud Tu, Jay Lee

    • Method Detail

      • cancelDiscovery

        public static void cancelDiscovery()
        Use cancelDiscovery() to cancel an ongoing discovery.

      • checkMeterSeries

        public static boolean checkMeterSeries(java.lang.String deviceName)
        Check paired device prefix name, and limit for taidoc meter or diamond series
        Parameters:
        deviceName -
        Returns:
        if device name contain "taidoc" or "diamond" or "fora" return true, others return false

      • deviceDelay

        public static void deviceDelay(int delayTime)
        In some device, it needs to delay a while for pair and unpair.

        Parameters:
        delayTime - Delay time(unit:millisecond)
        Throws:
        {@link - InterruptedException}

      • getBluetoothAdapter

        public static BluetoothAdapter getBluetoothAdapter()
        Gets the android device BluetoothAdapter.

        Returns:
        the android device BluetoothAdapter
        Throws:
        {@link - AndroidDeviceBluetoothUtilException}

      • getPairedDevice

        public static BluetoothDevice getPairedDevice(java.lang.String macAddress)
        Provides the specific MAC address to get the device which paired with android device.

        Parameters:
        macAddress - the BluetoothDevice MAC Address
        Returns:
        A BluetoothAdapter Object List, which are paired meter list.
        Throws:
        {@link - AndroidDeviceBluetoothUtilException}

      • getPairedDevices

        public static java.util.List<BluetoothDevice> getPairedDevices()
        Returns the devices that paired with android device.

        Returns:
        A BluetoothAdapter Object List, which are paired meter list.
        Throws:
        {@link - AndroidDeviceBluetoothUtilException}

      • pairWithRemoteDevices

        public static java.util.List<BluetoothDevice> pairWithRemoteDevices(Context context,
                                                    java.util.List<BluetoothDevice> remoteDeviceList)
        Pair the remoteDeviceList devices, and return the pair result as a List object.

        Parameters:
        context - Context
        remoteDeviceList - All device list, it is a BluetoothDevice object list.
        Returns:
        A BluetoothDevice Object List, which are paired meter list.
        Throws:
        {@link - AndroidDeviceBluetoothUtilException}

      • searchRemoteDevices

        public static java.util.List<BluetoothDevice> searchRemoteDevices(Context context)
        Search All Meter devices in the region

        Parameters:
        context - Context
        Returns:
        A BluetoothAdapter Object List, which are all meter list in the region.
        Throws:
        {@link - AndroidDeviceBluetoothUtilException}

        Start discovery mode
